title: Correction to: Geometry for low-inertia aerosol capture: Lessons from fog-basking beetles
content: This is a correction to: Aida Shahrokhian, Fan Kiat Chan, Jiansheng Feng, Mattia Gazzola, Hunter King, Geometry for low-inertia aerosol capture: Lessons from fog-basking beetles, PNAS Nexus, Volume 3, Issue 2, February 2024, pgae077, https://doi.org/10.1093/pnasnexus/pgae077
